summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of The City of Seattle in the sum of Thirteenth Thousand Five Hundred and no/100 Dollars (13,500.00), for the purpose of completing the improvement of Dearborn Street et al. by An Ordinance providing for the rebating and refunding of the excess portions of all assessment levied for the improvement of-grading, as authorized by Ordinance No. 20981, creating Local Improvement District No. 2075.
